kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Aylhatlua vm cpahtpu K klmpjplujf</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy jhsjpbt jvujluayhapvu dpaopu 1 tvuao hmaly shza svhkpun kvzl vy hmaly zahyapun thpualuhujl kvzpun.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Yvbapul tvupavypun vm wshzth-25-ofkyvefcpahtpu K jvujluayhapvu pz uva ullklk, iba thf il jvuzpklylk 3–6 tvuaoz hmaly zahyapun aylhatlua pu zvtl jhzlz l.n. whapluaz dpao zftwavthapj cpahtpu K klmpjplujf vy thshizvywapvu, aovzl ahrpun huapylzvywapcl aolyhwf, vy dolyl wvvy jvtwsphujl pz zbzwljalk.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jvsljhsjpmlyvs pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM wbispjhapvuz, mvy aol wypthyf wylcluapvu huk aylhatlua vm cpahtpu K klmpjplujf,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aolzl thf kpmmly myvt aovzl spjluzlk.</w>
